Frequency once per 10 minutes

Trigger One of your team children within 60 feet critically fails against a foe with a weapon attack roll, an unarmed attack roll, or an Athletics skill check with the attack trait, or a foe critically hits one of your team children within 60 feet

Effect You unleash an intimidating string of abuse at how unfair the situation was, that the gods or the universe (or the poor referee if the encounter is a gladiatorial match or otherwise has one) made a bad call, and other such excuses. You immediately attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} the target of your team child's triggering critical failure or the creature who critically hit your team child, as long as they are within 60 feet of your team child (ignoring the usual range restrictions on Demoralize). However, if you critically fail your attempt to Demoralize, your team child feels so awkward about all the fuss that they become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Special You can use this reaction for any skill check made during a sporting event, even if it isn't one of the usual types of triggering checks. If you do, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Intimidation check.
